advisories.title: Moderate: xorg-x11-server-Xwayland security and bug fix update
advisories.description:
Xwayland is an X server for running X clients under Wayland.

Security Fix(es):

* xorg-x11-server: X.Org Server Overlay Window Use-After-Free Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability (CVE-2023-1393)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Additional Changes:

For detailed information on changes in this release, see the AlmaLinux Release Notes linked from the References section.
